item.title: Why linkForge
item.description:
Need for low-latency, accurate 3D pose tracking.

Outdoor robots such as contruction - and agricultural robots are designed for increasing autonomy and low maintenance costs. For inceased autonoumous control, the exact positions of the links need to be tracked and fed to the controlled with low latency.

The current solutions based on LVDT signals and rotational encoders do not always meet required performance. linkForge obatins the needed performance by combing existing sensors such as wheeel encoders, then adding inertial measurement units (IMU’s). Signals are combined using well known sensor fusion techniques to stream the poses of each link to the controller.

About Me

Passionate about extracting information from sensors and their applications.

I have a proven record of creating industry-changing solutions in the field of mems-inertial navigation, human movement tracking and gas sensing.
